Set.Top: <script type="text/javascript" src="@sys_contextpath/EWA_STYLE/js/UTILS/EWA_UT_TRANS.js"></script> <input type=button value='TransAll' onclick='tall()' > <input type=button value='SaveAll' onclick='saveall()' >

Set.Name: OnPagePost SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE _EWA_APP_CFG SET APP_TITLE_ENUS = @APP_TITLE_ENUS, APP_MAP_LABEL_ENUS = @APP_MAP_LABEL_ENUS, APP_MAP_MSG_ENUS = @APP_MAP_MSG_ENUS, APP_BUT_TITLE_ENUS = @APP_BUT_TITLE_ENUS WHERE APP_ID=@APP_ID;

Set.Name: ref
Set.Sql: SELECT APP_ID, convert(varchar,APP_ID)+'. '+APP_TITLE + '/' +APP_TYPE APP_TITLE FROM _EWA_APP_CFG a WHERE APP_Add_para0 in (select app_add_para0 from _EWA_APP_CFG where app_id=@app_id) ORDER BY a.APP_TITLE

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql:
SELECT * FROM _EWA_APP_CFG WHERE ( (app_add_para0=isnull(@para0,'ERPV2')) and (app_add_para1=@para1 or @para1 is null) and (app_add_para2=@para2 or @para2 is null) ) or( @para0='CAMPV2' and @para1='student' and app_add_para1='student_add' ) AND APP_LVL>1
ORDER BY APP_LVL , APP_ORD

Set.Name: OnTreeNodeNew SQL
Set.Sql: INSERT INTO _EWA_APP_CFG(APP_PID, APP_TITLE, APP_LVL, APP_ORD) SELECT @APP_PID, @APP_TITLE, A.LVL, B.ORD FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(APP_LVL) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(APP_LVL) + 1 END LVL FROM _EWA_APP_CFG WHERE APP_ID=@APP_PID) A, (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(APP_ORD) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(APP_ORD) + 1 END ORD FROM _EWA_APP_CFG WHERE APP_PID=@APP_PID) B; SELECT * FROM _EWA_APP_CFG WHERE APP_PID=@APP_PID AND APP_TITLE=@APP_TITLE

Set.Name: OnPageLoad4Tree SQL
Set.Sql:
SELECT * FROM _EWA_APP_CFG WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY APP_LVL , APP_ORD

Set.Name: loadicons
Set.Sql:
SELECT * FROM _EWA_APP_CFG WHERE (app_add_para0=isnull(@para0,'ERP')) AND APP_LVL>=2
ORDER by APP_LVL, APP_ORD

Set.Name: OnPagePost SQL
ref
Set.Sql: SELECT APP_ID, convert(varchar,APP_ID)+'. '+APP_TITLE + '/' +APP_TYPE APP_TITLE FROM _EWA_APP_CFG a WHERE APP_Add_para0 in (select app_add_para0 from _EWA_APP_CFG where app_id=@app_id) ORDER BY a.APP_TITLE

Set.DisplayList: list（列表）,frame（修改页面）,detail（细节）,web（页面）,other（其它）,home（主页列表）,js（脚本动态生成）,calendar（日历）,ref（引用）,catalog（分类目录）

Set.Sql: SELECT APP_ID , APP_TITLE + '' +APP_TYPE APP_TITLE FROM _EWA_APP_CFG WHERE APP_PID=@APP_ID ORDER BY APP_ORD
SELECT APP_ID , APP_TITLE + '' +APP_TYPE APP_TITLE FROM _EWA_APP_CFG WHERE APP_PID=@APP_ID ORDER BY APP_ORD
SELECT APP_ID, APP_TITLE + '' +APP_TYPE APP_TITLE FROM _EWA_APP_CFG WHERE APP_PID=@APP_ID ORDER BY APP_ORD
